title: Broad bean, yoghurt and mint soup
description: This soup turns out the most cool, pale green, so pretty when it is flecked with darker green mint and bright green, skinned beans. Don't reheat the soup once you have mixed in the yoghurt. If it gets too hot it will curdle in a most unattractive manner.
ingredients: 450g/1lb shelled broad beans, thawed if frozen, blanched and skins removed
1 generous sprig fresh summer savory or thyme
1 litre/1Â¾ pints hot chicken stock or vegetable stock
salt and freshly ground black pepper
paprika or cayenne pepper, for dusting
